des: "Easy and delicious, this spicy orange chicken wing sauce will give you an alternative to going out for your favorite spicy orange chicken dish."
ins: Stir the orange marmalade, rice vinegar, hoisin sauce, soy sauce, and chili sauce together in a saucepan until combined. Place over medium-high heat, bring to a simmer, and cook until slightly thickened, about 5 minutes.
